definition: to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of
Mr Wang from next door (term used jocularly to refer to a neighbor who is supposedly sleeping with one's wife)

sentences.english: Next door, Chueh-min struck a match and lit the oil lamp.
sentences.chinese: 在隔壁房間裏覺民把火柴擦燃，點了燈。

sentences.english: And I really love the Junya Watanabe pieces that are in the next room.
sentences.chinese: 還有我真的很喜歡隔壁一間房間裏渡邊淳彌的衣服。

sentences.english: This is the Carters' house and ours is the next.
sentences.chinese: 這是卡特家的房子，我們的是隔壁那座。

sentences.english: I'm in the neighborhood, hoping I could pop by your flat.
sentences.chinese: 我就在隔壁想到你家來坐坐。

sentences.english: The man who lives next to you is sussed by the police in this case.
sentences.chinese: 住在你隔壁的那個男人，警方認爲他是該案的嫌疑犯。

sentences.english: Neibour's tree is growing over the wall on my side.
sentences.chinese: 隔壁家的樹從牆上長到我這邊來了。

sentences.english: My next door neighbour is moving out next week.
sentences.chinese: 下週我隔壁的鄰居就要搬走了。

sentences.english: "You mean the people who live in the big house next door, don't you?" asked one of the girls.
sentences.chinese: 你們說的是住在隔壁那座大房子裏的人嗎？

sentences.english: We could smell the dinner cooking in the next room.
sentences.chinese: 我們可聞得到隔壁房間燒菜的味道。

sentences.english: He'd been next to me all three.
sentences.chinese: 在這三年裏，他都住在我的隔壁。

sentences.english: Annie: Besides her dormitory is just next door to our Foreign Stu-dents Building.
sentences.chinese: 對於我的隔壁宿舍的鄰居們，我也有同樣的感覺。

sentences.english: Shaken on hearing from the next room, the mother came to see me, and Sharp have white faces.
sentences.chinese: 聞聲從隔壁房間跑來的母親見到我這樣，臉霎得白了。

sentences.english: Carl Meier was stationed in the family's neighborhood during the German occupation.
sentences.chinese: 在德軍佔領期，卡爾邁耶住在母親家隔壁。

sentences.english: The people next door were Latvian, the Saulitises.
sentences.chinese: 他們隔壁住着一家拉脫維亞人，姓索利提斯。

sentences.english: I heard the typewriter clacking in the next office.
sentences.chinese: 我聽見隔壁辦公室中打字機發出嗒嗒的聲音。

sentences.english: She lives upstairs, over there, next door to Joe the baby-grabber.
sentences.chinese: 她住在樓上，那邊，那個“捉小孩的人”喬的隔壁。

definition: upstairs/(Internet slang) previous poster in a forum thread
midnight/in the middle of the night
outside (also pr. [wai4 mian5] for this sense)/surface/exterior/external appearance
